Repack Features

  • Based on Aviano-DOGE ISO release: wow-aviano.iso (18,476,791,808 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 17.2 to 10.1 GB)
  • Installation takes 5-12 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 17.1 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Use “Aviano on DX11” desktop icon to run the game on Windows 7/8/8.1

Game Description

Aviano is an exploration game from other worlds, where the player plays an archaeologist who wants to solve a mystery! And it will take him to fly with his hang glider in other ways, challenging your pilot skills until the end of each level. The controls are easy to understand but skill based, the physics-based flight model. It offers a realistic flight experience, similar to a real flying wing, aim with higher speeds to entertain and give speed sensations to the player. Hang gliding simulation game, on an adventure with a story to guide you to unexplored places and strange new worlds. Test your piloting skills, experience the feeling of flying highly detailed hang gliders in unique conditions.

Game Features

  • If you have an AMD RX 6000 series or Nvidia RTX 3000 series, you can enjoy this game in 4k mode.
  • 235 LEVELS (143 + 13 Levels story Campaign, 39 Levels Ring Attack Campaign, 39 levels Time Attack Campaign, 13 Player Vs Player Campaign)
  • 20+ HOURS OF GAMEPLAY (After learning how to use your hang glider you can use it for the three long campaigns, but also to fly without a purpose.)
  • You will discover wilderness areas of your world and strange new worlds.
  • Meticulously detailed hang gliders.
  • The Story Campaign will guide you to fantastic places and worlds.
  • Play as a pro or a beginner by adjusting the difficulty level.
  • The Story Campaign will guide you to fantastic places and worlds.
  • Learn how to use your hang glider before venturing into history.
